mapper.sql: SELECT S.id AS id, C.id AS category_id, C.name AS category_name, S.name AS name, S.image_path AS image_path, S.introduction AS introduction, S.sequence AS sequence FROM subcategories S
mapper.select: SELECT V.name_key FROM video_on_demands V INNER JOIN subcategory_video_on_demands S ON S.video_on_demand_id = V.id WHERE S.subcategory_id = #{subcategoryId}
